title: Document AI - Method: processors.get
abstract:
# Document AI - Method: processors.get
**Full name** : projects.locations.processors.get
Gets a processor detail.
#
content:
## HTTP request`GET https://{endpoint}/v1beta3/{name}`
Where `{endpoint}` is one of the [supported service endpoints](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest#rest_endpoints) .
### Path parameters| Parameters | Parameters.1                                                         |
|:-------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| name   | string Required. The processor resource name. It takes the form projects/{project}/locations/{location}/processors/{processor}. Authorization requires the following IAM permission on the specified resource name: documentai.processors.get |
### Request bodyThe request body must be empty.
### Response bodyIf successful, the response body contains an instance of ` [Processor](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1beta3/projects.locations.processors#Processor) ` .
### Authorization scopesRequires the following OAuth scope:- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform`For more information, see the [Authentication Overview](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/) .
### IAM PermissionsRequires the following [IAM](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs) permission on the `name` resource:- `documentai.processors.get`For more information, see the [IAM documentation](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs) .
